text: Sabaka jatibandhuko lagi uniharuko nivasasthanama nai allahako saktiko e'uta nisani thiyo. Unako bayam ra dayam du'ivata bagaica thi'e hamile unala'i adesa di'eka thiyaum ki ‘‘aphno palanakartale di'eko jivika kha'u, ra usaprati abhara prakata gara. Yo sahara pani ramro ra palanakarta pani ksamasila’’ cha
